definition: to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子篩預先經鹼處理，能夠明顯改善催化劑穩定性。

sentences.english: Reaction pathway of cyclohexanone over these catalysts was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了環己酮在這類催化劑上雙聚反應的機理。

sentences.english: EA is oxidized completely and no partially oxidized side-products are formed over the catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 乙酸乙酯在催化劑上完全被氧化且無副產物生成。

sentences.english: The pore structures of catalyst influence interparticle diffusion which mainly determines the effectiveness factor.
sentences.chinese: 催化劑的孔結構對有效因子有很大影響。

sentences.english: The major three-way catalysts and its properties were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了幾種主要的三效催化劑及其應用情況。

sentences.english: Lipase N435 was screened as catalyst, and tert-butanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出脂肪酶N435作爲催化劑，叔丁醇作爲溶劑。

sentences.english: In this paper, a kind of new catalysts for olefins hydroformylation was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本論文研製了一種新型烯烴氫甲酰化催化劑。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometric method for determining rhenium content in Pt Re reforming catalysts is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用分光光度法測定重整催化劑中錸含量的方法。

sentences.english: These layers are traditionally prepared using catalysts that contain metal.
sentences.chinese: 這些絕緣層傳統上的催化劑包含金屬。

sentences.english: O2-TPD test indicates that adsorbed oxygen has no relationship complying with catalyst activity.
sentences.chinese: TPD實驗表明吸附氧與催化劑活性沒有順應關係。

sentences.english: The study demonstrates that the quality of reaction accelerator can influence the density of refined copper.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，反應催化劑的質量影響精煉銅的密度。

sentences.english: The research development in catalysts for Syndiotactic polymerization of styrene is re-viewed .
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了製備間規聚苯乙烯用催化劑的研究進展。

sentences.english: The catalyst could be regenerated by alkali washing.
sentences.chinese: 經過鹼洗，可以使催化劑再生。

sentences.english: A new method to recover silver from silver-bearing waste catalytic agent is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了從含銀的廢催化劑中回收白銀的一種新方法。

sentences.english: The preparation methods of metal nanocatalysts include chemical methods and physical methods.
sentences.chinese: 納米金屬催化劑的製備方法包括化學法和物理法。

sentences.english: It is found that the catalytic activities are greatly enhanced after sulfation.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現，載體表面硫酸化後催化劑的活性大大增加。

definition: to flee from danger/to avoid danger/to minimize risk/(finance) hedge
variant of 復甦|复苏[fu4 su1]/to recover (health, economic)/to resuscitate/anabiosis
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
